CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Display Predictive Values
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Not Recommended. xDrip will attempt to predict readings each minute based on the past few values.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Interpret Raw Values
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If using Share, DexDrip will show values when they are normally hidden on the receiver.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Speak Readings
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If the phone has text-to-speech capabilities it will read new readings out loud.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Store logs for troubleshooting
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Only enable if you are having trouble with the app.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Datatables
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show Calibration and BG datatables in the app drawer.
